channel.title: Ok i downloaded jdk 6 but
channel.description:
:mad: ;D :confused:ok, i downloaded jdk 6 u17 and i installed it. now i am trying to use a guide here to make custom items but it requires me to compile my server or client or whatever on rsmv. but i try and it says jdk 5.0 or 6.0 is not recognised and so on and so forth... PLEASE POST A VERY VERY VERY DETAILED GUIDE ON WHAT I SHOULD DO. thank you!
some times we just don't make sense. well, at least i dont.

item.title: Ok i downloaded jdk 6 but
item.dc:creator: @neptune neptune
item.description:
@neptune wrote:

umm legend i didn’t really understand but what i did was copy and paste ur pics into cprrect stuff etc… didn’t work. i use vista btw would that make a difference? all it says by folders is jdk 1.6.0_17

help more?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2009, 05:30:03 pm[/size][hr]umm please help more i said?

Read full topic

item.title: Ok i downloaded jdk 6 but
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

go thru your program files then to java and see the names to the next folders?
make them into your path and classpath like this.

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin

even though my jdk is high then the ones shown those are the names to my folders

this is your path .

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin;C:\windows\system32

this keeps the path open and your sitll able to use cmd.exe (C:\windows\system32 part)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2009, 07:33:19 pm[/size][hr]this help?

Read full topic

item.title: Ok i downloaded jdk 6 but
item.dc:creator: @neptune neptune
item.description:
@neptune wrote:

im absolutely sure it’s not the compilers problem, dont give me compilers. i know, that the jdk i need isn’t installed. remember, this isn’t a server compiler, it’s for the model program i got from a tutorial and i need some more help on why it says jdk won’t work.(http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,262499.0.html) is the tutorial

Read full topic

item.title: Ok i downloaded jdk 6 but
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Update your compiler.

Make a new file under notepad and copy this in:

@echo off :menu title Purerscape compiler echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo Welcome to Purerscape compiler, thankyou for using me. echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo Note: Remember the rule if you get 100 errors echo You need a } for every { echo Errors will show up if any below the line. echo ________________________________________________________________________________ echo Errors: echo ________________________________________________________________________________ if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiling Finished. pause exit

Then save it as compiler2.bat. Make sure that you include the .bat. Then drag it into your client folder and run it. Should work post if it doesn’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Ok i downloaded jdk 6 but
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

isnt custom items in a client and not a server?
